TopicTitle: Any cool landing spots on duna?

Articles.Content:
This is where i ended up for now. As you can see, i want to build a base in Duna! So, i have plenty m/s dv to spend, i could even do a powered landing, i have trust issues with parachutes...

Anyone know where i could land this thing? I mean beautiful locations, canyons, tall mountains, easter eggs. I dont want to land it on the ice cap.

Thanks in advance!
I don't quite remember were it is but their is a face on duna you can land near but I don't know the coordinates.
I really love the border where the dust transforms to ice. Your dv might just not be enough ...
Not enough? Why? I could even land on ike
I somehow have ended up on the north pole of Duna twice in the past two trips there. It's definitely different from the rest of the planet.
